head: Internship
text: Shannon is heading to MIT Lincoln Laboratory in Lexington, MA this summer.

head: Internship
text: Dylan is heading to IBM Research in Cambridge, MA this summer.

head: Award
text: Dylan's paper, RNNbow: Visualizing Learning via Backpropagation Gradients in Recurrent Neural Networks, wins Best Paper Award at VADL 2017

head: Grant
text: VALT received a grant from DARPA in the Data Driven Discovery of Models program (d3m) in coordination with Georgia Tech and University of Wisconsin.

head: New Paper
text: Anzu's paper, PROACT: Iterative Design of a Patient-Centered Visualization for Effective Prostate Cancer Health Risk Communication, was presented at IEEE VAST.

head: Award
text: Alvitta's paper, Personality as a Predictor of User Strategy: How Locus of Control Affects Search Strategies on Tree Visualizations, wins Honorable Mention Award at CHI 2015.

head: Grant
text: Remco received the NSF CAREER award for our work on data and user modeling from user interactions.

head: Award
text: Sam's paper, Exploring Visualization Designs Using Phylogenetic Trees, wins Best Paper Award at VDA 2015.

head: Grant
text: VALT received a grant with MIT Lincoln Labs on Adaptive, Reinforced, and Interactive Visual Analytics.

head: New Paper
text: Eli's paper, Finding Waldo: Learning about Users from their Interactions, accepted to IEEE VAST and TVCG.

head: New Paper
text: Lane's paper, Ranking Visualizations of Correlation using Weber's Law, accepted to IEEE InfoVis and TVCG.

head: Special Event
text: Hiroshi Ishii speaks on Vision-Driven: Beyond Tangible Bits, Towards Radical Atoms at the VALT and HCI Labs.
